features: We consulted closely with dental professionals to create a toothbrush that gets your teeth cleaner but minimizes your impact on the environment
The design includes a curved handle for those hard-to-reach places and a three-level bristle arrangement to massage your gums
While the bristles are brand new, the handle is made from recycled yogurt cups
body.description: We consulted closely with dental professionals to create a toothbrush that gets your teeth cleaner but minimizes your impact on the environment. The design includes a curved handle for those hard-to-reach places and a three-level bristle arrangement to massage your gums. and while the bristles are brand new, the handle is made from recycled yogurt cups.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are the best toothbrushes!
reviews.reviewText: I have used these conventional toothbrushes for years, as I cannot tolerate a vibrating toothbrush. I have used soft, but I prefer "ultra soft," because it is very gentle on the gums. The ergonomic handle and small brush head make it super easy to get to the back teeth and to also get a good angle to clean your gums. They come in a variety of primary and pastel colors. They are recycled plastic, and you can recycle the toothbrush and the wrapper. These toothbrushes are very simple, yet because they are designed well, they do the job beautifully- no cavities for years! They are also very reasonably priced compared to most conventional toothbrushes. I very highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The VERY BEST Toothbrush I've ever tried! Love these!
reviews.reviewText: I wish I could remember how long I've been using this brand of toothbrush, but it's been more than 2 to 3 years. I always get the softest bristles available, and they do the job great!! The ergonomics of the toothbrush and handle are awesome, so it makes brushing easier than with the usual, standard toothbrushes. I have a mobility disability, which makes doing even small, seemingly simple things like toothbrushing difficult and very painful, as I also have arthritis in my small joints, along with the bigger ones like my shoulders and elbows. Thanks to this toothbrush though, I find this daily "duty" to my body and health easier than when I used to use a typical toothbrush. THANK YOU SO MUCH!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Best Toothbrush I have ever owned
reviews.reviewText: It is so so so soft and gives such a great clean to my teeth. They are so smooth after each brush and makes me look forward to brushing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Preserve Ultra Soft Toothbrushes are the best and environmental too!
reviews.reviewText: The Preserve Ultra Soft Toothbrushes are the environmental as you can return for recycling. They are Ultra Soft just as stated on packaging. I have been using them for several years and they are the best toothbrushes ever!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Cannot mail back anymore. Good basic brush.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2019
reviews.reviewText: I love the Preserve toothbrushes. I am a fanatic when it comes to my teeth being clean, and I have tried every toothbrush out there. The Preserve is by far my favorite. It doesn't look special or different in any way but it sure does the job. It is heads above anything else out there and even though it is a little pricier than a lot of brushes out there it is worth it. In addition they are recyclable, just an added bonus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best tooth brushes!!
reviews.reviewText: Love the ultra soft, its easy on my gums & get my teeth clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Tooth Brush
reviews.reviewText: Preserve is my all time favorite tooth-brush. I love the way all the bristles are shaped uniformly and the length is perfect.. also not too big for my mouth. I use the Ultra Soft and can get in there and really scrub well not damaging my gums because the bristles are sooooo soft but yet made well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 11, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: Best shape ever for a toothbrush!
reviews.reviewText: Just love these. The fact that they’re curved makes it easier to apply the right amount of pressure when brushing my teeth. I don’t understand why the other toothbrush makers didn’t adopt this design . I’ve been using these for years. I always buy soft which doesn’t last as long as the medium or hard ones but it feels more gentle on my gums and teeth
